name: Castle Companion
description:
Castle Companion: An Story driven Platformer about a Companion and his friend getting lost in a dungeon.
Can you get out of the dungeon?
So grab your Companions and Sword and prepare for magical exploration, trap dodgeing, fighting and the BIG TWIST!

Various elements like:

- Moving and Falling Platforms

- Worms and Wallcrawlers

- An cute squishy Companion, named Muß, that grants you Dashing and Double Jumping and Follows you and encourages you!! 

And an Plot Twisting Ending. So grab your Companions and Sword and prepare for magical exploration, trap dodgeing and fighting!

Walkthrough: https://bit.ly/3pF7xnV
